akwa mkpuchi bụ ihe owuwu a na-ejikarị blanket,  akwa akwa akwa akwa, , na sofa cushions eme. A makwaara ya dị ka ebe a na-anọ eme ihe n'oche, ebe  ohiri isi na na-anọ efe ofufe, ebe a ma ọ bụ ebe a na'oche.
Akwụkwọ ndị nne na nna na-atụkarị aro iwu ihe mkpuchi dị ka ihe omume maka ndị nne na nne na nna ndị ọzọ ụra circadian rhythm ka ha sonye na ụmụ ha
A na-eme blanket na ndị mmadụ n'ihe banyere ụkpụrụ nke ụwa fort site na ijide blanket gburugburu ụlọ ma tinye ha n'ụzọ yiri ụlọ.
Dị ka ihe ntụrụndụ ụmụaka, a na-ekwukarị na akwụkwọ ụmụaka, dị ka Corduroy's Sleepover na If You Give a Pig a Party.
N'oge nke atọ nke usoro telivishọn Community, ihe omume "Digital Exploration of Interior Design" na "Pillows and Blankets" na-elekwasị anya n'echiche nke iwu nnukwu blanket fort.

Dị ka Guinness World Records si kwuo, nnukwu blanket fort e nwetụrụla bụ 625.8 m2 nke Shawn MacArthur, Victor Rundbaken, Heather Harteis, Sarah Kershner, Murderboat Productions, Rumpl, Kyle Bulloch, Alexa Soles na Rachael Klaus wuru
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ha nyere blanket ndị ahụ na-enweghị ebe obibi na mpaghara Portland, Oregon na 9 Disemba 2018.
